DOC.detailed_description: - The chemotherapy drug give twice every 28 day . This 28 day period call cycle study treatment . - Bevacizumab administer IV 90 minute day 1 day 15 . Gemcitabine administer IV 1 hour 40 minute day 1 15 cycle . Oxaliplatin administer IV 2 hour day 1 15 cycle . - The following test procedure perform day 1 day 15 cycle : physical examination ; medical history ; blood work ; urine test . A PET scan repeat end cycle 2 CT scan repeat every 8 week . - Participants continue receive cycle study treatment long disease progress experience serious side effect .
